name: ColumbusMuseumofArt
0:
”Alexa, open columbus museum of art”
”Ask Columbus Museum of Art what exhibitions are on view today?”
”Ask Columbus Museum of Art what there is to do today?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: columbus museum of art
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Columbus Museum of Art’s mission is to create great experiences with great art for everyone. Whether we are presenting an exhibition, designing an art-making activity, or giving visitors directions, we are guided by a vision to connect people and art. CMA nurtures that connection and removes barriers between our community and our collection.

Simply ask Alexa by saying:
"Alexa, open Columbus Museum of Art"
"Alexa, ask Columbus Museum of Art what exhibitions are on view today"
"Alexa, ask Columbus Museum of Art what there is to do today"
"Alexa, ask Columbus Museum of Art what is the cost of admission"
"Alexa, ask Columbus Museum of Art what hours is the museum open today"

We look forward to seeing you!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
